Author: Microsoft Developer
Title: Unlocking MCP Server: AI Integration for Dataverse & Dynamics 365
Description:
Join Elaiza Benitez and guest Nathan Rose - Microsoft MVP and HSO Functional Architect, as we explore how MCP Server is transforming low-code development and intelligent agent design. In this episode of The Low Code Revolution show, we dive into the Model Context Protocol (MCP) - the powerful new layer enabling seamless AI integration across Dataverse, Dynamics 365, and Copilot Studio.

In this video, Nathan shares:
- What MCP Server is and how it works
- Why MCP matters for everyone
- How MCP enables interactive and autonomous agentic AI
- Hands-on demos using Copilot Studio and Dataverse
- How to connect your own agents using MCP
- Key limitations and security considerations

Whether you're building intelligent agents or exploring AI in enterprise apps, this episode will help you unlock the potential of MCP Server.

Note: at the time of when this episode airs, this is a Preview feature.

Learn more about MCP in Copilot Studio at https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-copilot-studio/agent-extend-action-mcp Learn more about how to connect to Dataverse using an MCP server in Microsoft Copilot Studio at https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/power-apps/maker/data-platform/data-platform-mcps Learn more about Microsoft Copilot Studio at https://aka.ms/copilotstudio Check out Copilot Studio Agent Academy - Recruit, free self-paced learning to help you get started with Copilot Studio - https://aka.ms/agent-academy
